dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Lilium just announced a reverse merger with Qell Acquisition Corp, valuing the company at over three billion dollars.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Lilium just announced a reverse merger with Qell Acquisition Corp, valuing the company at over three billion dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Lilium will list on the Nasdaq through a reverse merger with former General Motors executive Barry Engles blank-check company Qell Acquisition Corp at a $3.3 billion valuation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they're raising, uh, 840 million dollars to fund development of their new seven-seat electric air taxi.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they're raising, uh, eight hundred forty million dollars to fund development of their new seven-seat electric air taxi.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Munich-based startup will raise $830 million through the deal with $380 million from Engles SPAC, and $450 million in private investments in public equity to fuel its bet small electric aircraft can beat the traffic on congested city roads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting—they actually scrapped their five-seat model earlier this year, so this is a pretty significant pivot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting-they actually scrapped their five-seat model earlier this year, so this is a pretty significant pivot.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The deal comes after Forbes revealed in February Lilium had scrapped plans for a five seat version of its aircraft and flight testing for the new larger air taxi would not start until 2022.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and they're aiming for commercial operations by 2024, which feels ambitious but exciting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and they're aiming for commercial operations by twenty twenty four, which feels ambitious but exciting.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Lilium said the funds would be used to fund the development and testing of a new seven seat electric aircraft and the launch of commercial operations in 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Daniel Wiegand, their CEO, said today's announcement brings them closer to launching passenger service—he really emphasized fixing broken transport infrastructure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Daniel Wiegand, their C E O, said today's announcement brings them closer to launching passenger service-he really emphasized fixing broken transport infrastructure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Today's announcement brings us closer to launching our passenger service, said Daniel Wiegand, co-founder and CEO, Lilium in a statement. Transport infrastructure is broken.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And he's not wrong about the carbon emissions and space consumption issues with current options.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he's not wrong about the carbon emissions and space consumption issues with current options.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The competition is heating up too—like, Joby raised even more earlier this year through a similar SPAC deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The competition is heating up too-like, Joby raised even more earlier this year through a similar S P A C deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Joby raised $1.6 billion in its own reverse merger with a blank-check company in February that valued the California-based business at $6.6 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, and Volocopter, their German rival, just secured 245 million from investors like BlackRock.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, and Volocopter, their German rival, just secured two hundred forty five million from investors like BlackRock.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Liliums German rival Volocopter also raised $239 million from investors including BlackRock earlier this month, according to Reuters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's wild how much capital is flowing into this sector all of a sudden.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's wild how much capital is flowing into this sector all of a sudden.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Lilium's already a unicorn after that Baillie Gifford investment back in June.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Lilium's already a unicorn after that Baillie Gifford investment back in June.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Lilium itself joined Europes unicorn club of startups with a $1 billion valuation following a $35 million round from high-profile tech investors Baillie Gifford in June.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They're also planning vertiport networks in Florida with Ferrovial, which owns Heathrow—that's a huge partnership.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're also planning vertiport networks in Florida with Ferrovial, which owns Heathrow-that's a huge partnership.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Lilium announced plans in January to develop a network of vertiports across Florida with Spanish infrastructure company Ferrovial, which is the owner of Londons Heathrow Airport, and revealed today that it was in talks for a similar network of shuttle landing pads in Europe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they're looking at something similar in Europe too. This isn't just about the tech; it's about building the whole ecosystem.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they're looking at something similar in Europe too. This isn't just about the tech; it's about building the whole ecosystem.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Lilium announced plans in January to develop a network of vertiports across Florida with Spanish infrastructure company Ferrovial, which is the owner of Londons Heathrow Airport, and revealed today that it was in talks for a similar network of shuttle landing pads in Europe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Barry Engle from Qell brings serious auto industry credibility too—former top exec at GM.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Barry Engle from Qell brings serious auto industry credibility too-former top exec at G M.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Qell was launched by Engle, GMs former top executive in North America, in August 2020 with the plan to invest in next-gen mobility.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. If anyone can help scale next-gen mobility, it's someone with that background.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. If anyone can help scale next-gen mobility, it's someone with that background.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Still, early 2022 for flight testing… that's what, like six months away? They've got a lot to prove.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, early twenty twenty two for flight testing... that's what, like six months away? They've got a lot to prove.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The deal comes after Forbes revealed in February Lilium had scrapped plans for a five seat version of its aircraft and flight testing for the new larger air taxi would not start until 2022.

artist_script:
Lilium's $3.35 billion SPAC deal is a massive bet on the future of urban air mobility.
HostA: Lilium just announced a reverse merger with Qell Acquisition Corp, valuing the company at over three billion dollars.
HostB: Yeah, and they’re raising, uh, 840 million dollars to fund development of their new seven-seat electric air taxi.
HostA: It’s interesting—they actually scrapped their five-seat model earlier this year, so this is a pretty significant pivot.
HostB: Right, and they’re aiming for commercial operations by 2024, which feels ambitious but exciting.
HostA: Daniel Wiegand, their CEO, said today’s announcement brings them closer to launching passenger service—he really emphasized fixing broken transport infrastructure.
HostB: And he’s not wrong about the carbon emissions and space consumption issues with current options.
HostA: The competition is heating up too—like, Joby raised even more earlier this year through a similar SPAC deal.
HostB: Exactly, and Volocopter, their German rival, just secured 245 million from investors like BlackRock.
HostA: It’s wild how much capital is flowing into this sector all of a sudden.
HostB: And Lilium’s already a unicorn after that Baillie Gifford investment back in June.
HostA: They’re also planning vertiport networks in Florida with Ferrovial, which owns Heathrow—that’s a huge partnership.
HostB: Yeah, and they’re looking at something similar in Europe too. This isn’t just about the tech; it’s about building the whole ecosystem.
HostA: Barry Engle from Qell brings serious auto industry credibility too—former top exec at GM.
HostB: For sure. If anyone can help scale next-gen mobility, it’s someone with that background.
HostA: Still, early 2022 for flight testing… that’s what, like six months away? They’ve got a lot to prove.
